meanings.definition: Covered with or full of froth
meanings.sent1: The cappuccino was frothier than the latte.
meanings.sent2: The ocean waves became frothier as the storm approached.
meanings.sent3: The frothier soap bubbles made bath time more fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was frothier than a shaken soda can.
meanings.sent5: The frothier milk in the milkshake made it extra creamy and delicious.

meanings.sent1: The frothier detergent created more bubbles in the washing machine.
meanings.sent2: The frothier soap bar lathered up quickly in the shower.
meanings.sent3: The frothier fountain in the park delighted the children playing nearby.
meanings.sent4: The frothier clouds in the sky signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent5: The frothier beer poured from the tap had a rich and satisfying taste.

meanings.definition: Having a frothy or bubbly consistency
meanings.sent1: The frothier milkshake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: The frothier pancake batter resulted in fluffy breakfast treats.
meanings.sent3: The frothier bath foam made bath time feel like a spa experience.
meanings.sent4: The frothier champagne was perfect for celebrating special occasions.
meanings.sent5: The frothier hot chocolate was a comforting treat on a cold winter day.
